iThemes Builder

Bruce â€¢ Jul 10, 2012

I use iThemes' Builder theme for many of my custom site development projects. The folks at iThemes take a great amount of pride in Builder and their entire suite of themes and plugins.

Builder is a powerful and sometimes complex theme to deploy, but don't let that prevent you from giving it a look, especially the every growing library of wonderful child themes that iThemes continues to develop. If you do decide to purchase Builder, I appreciate your using the following link as it is my affiliate link with iThemes.

Purchase Builder Today!
